#app1 (model/bind) example

Message: 

var app1 = new Exp({
    el: '#app1',
    data: {
        message: ''
    }
});

#app2 (model/bind/methods) example

Message: 

var app2 = new Exp({    
    el: '#app2',
    data: {
        message: ''
    },
    methods: {
        reverseMessage() {
            this.message = this.message.split('').reverse().join('');
        }
    }
});
